1650.quoteText: After a Snap is deleted, we’ll mainly be able to see the basic details — like when it was sent and who it was sent to.
1650.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

tosdr.case: This service holds onto content that you've deleted
tosdr.tldr: They say that „Mainly“ they can only see basic information. Obviously that implies that they may save any other data as well so that exceptions to the „Mainly“ are possible.

8938.quoteText:
We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time.
But when we do, we’ll let you know one way or another
8938.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

11572.quoteText: Like most online services and mobile applications, we may use cookies and other technologies, such as web beacons, web storage, and unique advertising identifiers, to collect information about your activity, browser, and device.
11572.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

11573.quoteText:
We may also use these technologies to collect information when you interact with services we offer through one of our partners, such as advertising and commerce features.
For example, we may use information collected on other websites to show you more relevant ads.
11573.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

11574.quoteText: provide and improve our advertising services, ad targeting, and ad measurement, including through the use of your precise location information (again, if you’ve given us permission to collect that information),
11574.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data

11575.quoteText: To the extent permissible under law, you irrevocably waive—or agree not to assert against Snap and its affiliates to the extent a waiver is not permitted—any moral rights or equivalent rights you may have in the Asset throughout the world.
11575.title: You waive your moral rights

11576.quoteText: We may change, suspend, or end any service, or modify prices prospectively, in our discretion.
11576.title: They may stop providing the service at any time

tosdr.case: They may stop providing the service at any time

11577.quoteText:
You have the right to control your information.
That’s why we provide easy ways to access and update your information, adjust how much information you share with us, and request that we delete your information — or your account, altogether.
11577.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

11578.quoteText: If you ever decide to stop using Snapchat, you can just ask us to delete your account.
11578.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

11579.quoteText:
We may collect information about you from other users, our affiliates, and third parties. Here are a few examples:

  • If you link your Snapchat account to another service (like Bitmoji or a third-party app), we may receive information from the other service, like how you use that service.
  • Advertisers, app developers, publishers, and other third parties may share information with us as well
11579.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties
